duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and support ERP implementation projects, configuring, and maintaining the Dynamics 365 system.
Analyze financial suite modules and lead small project coordination and change management efforts.
Document and diagram current processes, master data setup, and analyze data for the manufacturing business.
Introduce new capabilities to the organization and manage full lifecycle project implementations within an ERP framework.
Utilize Excel, BI tools, and SQL queries to analyze data for reporting and decision-making purposes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business or Technical Major (Master's preferred)
